conclusion: Preliminary objection rejected (six month period);Violation of Art. 6-1;Not necessary to examine Art. 6-2;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-pecuniary damage - finding of violation sufficient;Costs and expenses award - domestic proceedings;Costs and expenses award - Convention proceedings
docname: CASE OF DEMICOLI v. MALTA - [Russian Translation]
issue: House of Representatives (Privileges and Powers) Ordinance (Chapter 179 of the Revised Edition of the Laws of Malta), Section 11 (1) k ; Press Act 1974 (Act no. XL of 1974)
